title: Azir the most busted champ design to hit the game ever.
body: Literally nothing you can do to him because his soldier cannot be touched, INSANELY heavy dmg ass well as the soliders gives a half screen worth of range. Please delete this champ and try again, seriously the most obnoxious champ ever released with literally ZERO counter play like none.

replies.body: Play veigar, QR and wipe the sweat from your forehead at all the skill you just used ;)
Play assassin, dodge his slow, 100-0 all day everyday.
